Package chess

Interface ChessGame

All Known Implementing Classes:
MyChessGame
public interface ChessGame
For a class that can manage a chess game, making moves on a board

      Gets a valid moves for a piece at the given location
      Parameters:
      startPosition - the piece to get valid moves for
      Returns:

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • isInStalemate

      boolean isInStalemate(ChessGame.TeamColor teamColor)
      Determines if the given team is in stalemate, which here is defined as having no valid moves
      Parameters:
      teamColor - which team to check for stalemate
      Returns:
      True if the specified team is in stalemate, otherwise false
